title: Vrezh Kirakosyan
text:
Vrezh Kirakosyan (in <a href="Armenian%20language">Armenian</a> Վրեժ Կիրակոսյան) (born in 1983) is an <a href="Armenia">Armenia</a>n <a href="singing">singer</a> who won the first series (2010–2011) of the Armenian "<a href="X-Factor%20%28Armenian%20TV%20series%29">X-Factor</a>" series (in <a href="Armenian%20language">Armenian</a> Իքս-Ֆակտոր) after getting top votes in the final broadcast live on the Armenian <a href="Shant%20TV">Shant TV</a> station on 15 May 2011, against rival finalist and runner-up Srbuhi Sargsyan.
Title holder Kirakosyan competed in the "over 25" category and was mentored by judge Gisané Palyan. As a result of his victory, he has a contract with <a href="Sony%20Records">Sony</a> for two singles in addition to filming of a music video for his winning song.
